00038 #define DAT_FILE_MAGIC_NUMBER 0xFC
00039 
00041 #define DAT_FILE_HEADER_SIZE 512

00051 CDATFileHeaderData::CDATFileHeaderData()

00054         m_nRows = 0;

00061 bool CDATFileData::Exists()
00062 {
00063         // Find the file stats.
00064         struct stat st;
00065         return (stat(m_FileName.c_str(), &st) == 0);
00066 }

00070 bool CDATFileData::Read()
00071 {
00072         // First close the previously opened file.
00073         Close();
00074 
00075         // Open the file.
00076         m_File.open(m_FileName.c_str(), ios::in|ios::binary);
00077         if (!m_File)
00078         {
00079                 return false;
00080         }
00081 
00082         // Check if new type.
00083         uint8_t magic=0;
00084         ReadUInt8(m_File, magic);
00085         if (magic != DAT_FILE_MAGIC_NUMBER)
00086         {
00087                 return false;
00088         }
00089 
00090         // Read the rows and columns.
00091         uint16_t cols;
00092         uint16_t rows;
00093         ReadUInt16_I(m_File, cols);
00094         ReadUInt16_I(m_File, rows);
00095         m_HeaderData.SetRows(rows);
00096         m_HeaderData.SetCols(cols);
00097 
00098         // The total number of pixels.
00099         uint32_t total;
00100         ReadUInt32_I(m_File, total);
00101 
00102         // Read the min/max values
00103         uint32_t min;
00104         uint32_t max;
00105         ReadUInt32_I(m_File, min);
00106         ReadUInt32_I(m_File, max);
00107         m_HeaderData.SetMinValue(min);
00108         m_HeaderData.SetMaxValue(max);
00109 
00110         // Skip the unused entries
00111         m_File.seekg(2*sizeof(double) + 9 + 9 + 7 + 7 + 6 + 7 + 4 + 18, ios::cur);
00112 
00113         // Get the next item from the DAT file. This should include the scanner ID
00114         // and the array type.
00115         char buf[221];
00116         m_File.read(buf, 220);
00117 
00118         int len=0;
00119         char *endIndex = strstr(buf, ".1sq");
00120         if (endIndex != NULL)
00121         {
00122                 int index = (int)(strlen(buf) - strlen(endIndex));
00123                 while (index >= 0 && buf[index] != ' ')
00124                 {
00125                         ++len;
00126                         --index;
00127                 }
00128                 char *arrayType = &buf[index+1];
00129                 arrayType[len-1] = 0;
00130                 m_HeaderData.SetArrayType(arrayType);
00131 
00132                 index=0;
00133                 while (buf[index] != ' ')
00134                         ++index;
00135                 buf[index] = 0;
00136                 m_HeaderData.SetScannerID(buf);
00137         }
00138 
00139 
00140         // Skip more data
00141         m_File.seekg(2*sizeof(double) + sizeof(int32_t), ios::cur);
00142 
00143         // Now get the grid.
00144         int16_t coord;
00145         GridCoordinatesType grid;
00146 
00147         ReadInt16_I(m_File, coord);
00148         grid.upperleft.x = (int32_t) coord;
00149         ReadInt16_I(m_File, coord);
00150         grid.upperleft.y = (int32_t) coord;
00151 
00152         ReadInt16_I(m_File, coord);
00153         grid.upperright.x = (int32_t) coord;
00154         ReadInt16_I(m_File, coord);
00155         grid.upperright.y = (int32_t) coord;
00156 
00157         ReadInt16_I(m_File, coord);
00158         grid.lowerright.x = (int32_t) coord;
00159         ReadInt16_I(m_File, coord);
00160         grid.lowerright.y = (int32_t) coord;
00161 
00162         ReadInt16_I(m_File, coord);
00163         grid.lowerleft.x = (int32_t) coord;
00164         ReadInt16_I(m_File, coord);
00165         grid.lowerleft.y = (int32_t) coord;
00166 
00167         m_HeaderData.SetGridCorners(grid);
00168 
00169         return true;
00170 }

00173 
00174 uint16_t CDATFileData::GetPixel(int x, int y)
00175 {
00176         uint16_t pixel;
00177         int32_t offset = DAT_FILE_HEADER_SIZE + (y*m_HeaderData.GetCols() + x)*sizeof(uint16_t);
00178         m_File.seekg(offset, ios::beg);
00179         ReadUInt16_I(m_File, pixel);
00180         return pixel;
00181 }
00182 
00184 
00185 void CDATFileData::GetPixels(int rowIndex, uint16_t *pixels)
00186 {
00187         int cols = m_HeaderData.GetCols();
00188         uint16_t pixel;
00189         int32_t offset = DAT_FILE_HEADER_SIZE + (rowIndex*cols*sizeof(uint16_t));
00190         m_File.seekg(offset, ios::beg);
00191         m_File.read((char *)pixels, sizeof(uint16_t) * cols);
00192         for (int i=0; i<cols; i++)
00193         {
00194                 pixel = MmGetUInt16_I(&pixels[i]);
00195                 pixels[i] = pixel;
00196         }
00197 }
00198 
00200 
00201 void CDATFileData::GetPixels(int rowIndex, int rowCount, uint16_t *pixels)
00202 {
00203         int cols = m_HeaderData.GetCols();
00204         uint16_t pixel;
00205         int32_t offset = DAT_FILE_HEADER_SIZE + (rowIndex*cols*sizeof(uint16_t));
00206         m_File.seekg(offset, ios::beg);
00207         int npixels=cols*rowCount;
00208         m_File.read((char *)pixels, sizeof(uint16_t) * npixels);
00209         for (int i=0; i<npixels; i++)
00210         {
00211                 pixel = MmGetUInt16_I(&pixels[i]);
00212                 pixels[i] = pixel;
00213         }
00214 }

00231 void CDATFileData::Close()
00232 {
00233         if (m_File.is_open())
00234                 m_File.close();
00235 }

00239 bool CDATFileData::IsGCOSDATFile(const char *datFile)
00240 {
00241         // Open the file, check the magic number.
00242         ifstream instr(datFile, ios::in|ios::binary);
00243         uint8_t magic=0;
00244         ReadUInt8(instr, magic);
00245         instr.close();
00246         return (magic == DAT_FILE_MAGIC_NUMBER);
00247 }
00248 
00250 
00251 bool CDATFileData::UpdateGridCorners(const char *datFile, const GridCoordinatesType &grid)
00252 {
00253         // First check if it is a GCOS DAT file.
00254         if (IsGCOSDATFile(datFile) == false)
00255                 return false;
00256 
00257         // Open the file and seek to the coordinates.
00258         ofstream outstr(datFile, ios::in|ios::out|ios::binary);
00259         if (!outstr)
00260         {
00261                 return false;
00262         }
00263         int offset = sizeof(uint8_t) + 2*sizeof(uint16_t) + 3*sizeof(uint32_t) + 
00264                 2*sizeof(double) + 9 + 9 + 7 + 7 + 6 + 7 + 4 + 18 + 220 +
00265                 2*sizeof(double) + sizeof(int32_t);
00266         outstr.seekp(offset, ios::beg);
00267 
00268         // Now update the grid coordinates.
00269         WriteInt16_I(outstr, (int16_t)grid.upperleft.x);
00270         WriteInt16_I(outstr, (int16_t)grid.upperleft.y);
00271 
00272         WriteInt16_I(outstr, (int16_t)grid.upperright.x);
00273         WriteInt16_I(outstr, (int16_t)grid.upperright.y);
00274 
00275         WriteInt16_I(outstr, (int16_t)grid.lowerright.x);
00276         WriteInt16_I(outstr, (int16_t)grid.lowerright.y);
00277 
00278         WriteInt16_I(outstr, (int16_t)grid.lowerleft.x);
00279         WriteInt16_I(outstr, (int16_t)grid.lowerleft.y);
00280 
00281         outstr.close();
00282 
00283         return true;
00284 }
